snippet: The Institute for Supply Management said its services index fell to 57.1 last month from a reading of 58.6 in September.
lead_paragraph: The Institute for Supply Management said its services index fell to 57.1 last month from a reading of 58.6 in September.

headline.main: U.S. Services Sector Activity Slows Again; Private Payrolls Gain
headline.print_headline: * Job gains broad-based, mid-sized firm hiring surges
